name: Hilton Grand Vacations Inc.
description: Hilton Grand Vacations Inc. (HGV) is a leading global developer and operator of vacation ownership resorts. Founded in 1992 and based in Orlando, Florida, the company operates as a subsidiary of Hilton Worldwide and specializes in providing high-quality vacation experiences through its portfolio of timeshare properties. HGV offers a unique range of vacation experiences, allowing members to enjoy access to luxurious resorts in some of the most sought-after destinations across the United States and internationally. The company's business model focuses on developing, marketing, and selling vacation ownership interests, enabling families to create lasting memories through shared vacations. HGV emphasizes customer satisfaction and strives to deliver exceptional experiences, which is reflected in its commitment to service excellence. The company’s innovative approach includes a flexible points-based system that allows owners to customize their vacations according to their preferences and needs. With a strong dedication to sustainability, HGV aims to minimize its environmental impact and enhance the communities in which it operates. As travel demand continues to recover, Hilton Grand Vacations is well-positioned to capitalize on growth opportunities in the hospitality sector.
